exp3.title: OSTC - ATON (2021 - 2022)
exp3.details:
Commodity-Trader.
Ranked in the top 2.4% of candidates who successfully completed the recruitment program.
Specialized in natural gas, gasoil, and cocoa commodities.
Excelled in calendar spreads trading, earning 7x the monthly standard on trading bot patterns.

exp4.title: AST (2022 - 2023)
exp4.details:
Supervised the creation and testing of 14 trading bots for various purposes. 
Achieved an average total profit of 26% across all bots.

exp6.title: AASYP 360 (2024 - 2025)
exp6.details:
Developed a full document management application from scratch. 
Key features include: 
File upload and organization. 
Sorting and quick search with tag-based filtering. 
Document preview and multi-layer permissions. 
Control rules for different user roles. 
Two-step authentication.
